title: DSWO East Khasi Hills Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Rehabilitation Worker Posts
description: The District Social Welfare Office East Khasi Hills (DSWO East Khasi Hills) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05Â Community Based Rehabilitation Workers, Multipurpose Rehabilitation Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can also apply for these posts before the last date of the application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, 12th can apply for the DSWO East Khasi Hills Recruitment 2025 . The Interested applicants can apply in online mode. ...
